featured.text: Which of the following is a correct description about setts? (A)
Many ordinary clocks are hard to read early in the morning, deceiving students of the correct time, __22__ causing them to be late for school.
Unless (D) However 25. (A) best (B) correct (C) well (D) good 26.
Which of the following is CORRECT about the earthquake in Bam? (A) About 50,000 people survived the earthquake.

definition.zh_def: 正確的；符合事實或標準的。
definition.en_def: Free from error; in accordance with fact or truth.
definition.example: Please make sure your answers are correct before submitting the test.
